column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Aside from wasting 3+ hours at this dysfunctional establishment
column2: my only regret is not finding out what exactly happened. None of their employees could even muster up a decent story despite our prodding. Maybe our waitress wolfed down our pizza on her break? Maybe our pizza went on strike and refused to go in the oven for a few hours before finally coming to his senses? Â Unfortunately
